resources.string:
-1. Go to the Scenario Simulator tab in java desktop application.
0. Fill the IP address of the server
1. Select sensors to record
2. Press Record
3. From now, all steps are recording (ex. go to your game and play)
 4. Press Stop (from phone activity or from java application)
Please set the server IP first!
HTC - Nexus One,Samsung - Nexus S,Acer - A500
